fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: SSE has a wide interest in European legislation that impacts a privately listed energy company, including areas covering the single energy market (eg the Clean Energy Package); Climate and energy goals (eg the EU ETS); the Environment (eg Industrial Emissions Directive); Financial (eg MiFID II); Consumers (eg the Consumer Rights Directive); Plus other single market legislation: Covering areas including employment, services, taxation and corporate governance.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- Energy UK (member of Eurelectric) 
- Energy Networks Association [ENA] (member of Eurelectric) 
- Electricity Association of Ireland [EAI] (member of Eurelectric) 
- Renewable UK (member of Wind Europe) 
- Irish Wind Energy Association [IWEA] (member of Wind Europe) 
- Irish Business and Employers Confederation [IBEC] (member of Business Europe) 
- Confederation of British Industry - Northern Ireland [CBI NI] (member of Business Europe) 
- Association of Distributed Energy [ADE] (member of Euroheat and Power and the European Association of the promotion of Cogeneration) 
- European Federation of Energy Traders [EFET] 
- International Emissions Trading Association [IETA] 
- European Turbine Network
goals__remit:
SSE is a UK listed energy company, operating in the energy markets across the UK and Ireland.   
 
SSE has interests in the transmission, distribution, generation, storage and supply of electricity as well as the production, distribution, storage and supply of gas as well as other energy services.
